doc.title: A Kidnapping in Compton
doc.plot: Three young men who kidnap the son of a millionaire. Martin is a straight-laced executive assistant working his way up the corporate ladder for the PowerBar Corporation. When his boss, Mr. Barrington, decides to make cutbacks in the company Martin's position is the first to go. Martin's street savvy cousin, Magic, comes up with a plan to get revenge assist with his own financial woes. Along with his dim-witted wanna be rapper roommate Dante they decide to kidnap Mr. Barringtons ten year old son for ransom. Unfortunately the trio soon find out that they have bitten off way more than they can swallow. Martin's gold digging girlfriend, Sandra, finds out about their scheme and threatens to turn them in for the reward money offered by the Barrington family. The trio must figure out how to avoid being nabbed by the police and come out on top of the situation.
